name: Spellslingers
description:
You are a cowboy wizard

And you have to fight your way through an old mining town filled with the undead using your collection of powerful spells!

Spellslingers is a fast paced first-person shooter where you mix and match different elements to cast spells at your enemies.  Many spells have ways of interacting with each other to boost their power even further.  Master your spellcasting and you may just live to see another day!

Spellslingers is being developed by students at Chapman University.

Director & Programming Lead: Tyler Fitzpatrick
Art Lead:  Nat Nichols
Design Lead:  Ryan Trumpler
Sound Lead & Voice Acting:  Wyatt Hall
